seo.title: Cookies Policy | Diviso
seo.description: Learn how we use cookies in Diviso app and how to manage them.

what_are_cookies.title: 1. What Are Cookies?
what_are_cookies.content: Cookies are small text files stored on your device when you visit our website or use our application. These files help us improve your experience and remember your preferences.

essential.title: a. Essential Cookies
essential.content: These cookies are necessary for the website and application to function properly. They include:

analytics.title: b. Analytics Cookies
analytics.content: We use these cookies to understand how visitors use our website and to improve our services.

advertising.title: c. Advertising Cookies
advertising.content: We use third-party advertising services (such as Google AdSense) that may use cookies to display personalized ads based on your interests.

third_party.title: 3. Third-Party Cookies
third_party.content: Cookies may be placed by third parties when you use our services, including:
third_party.note: These services have their own privacy policies and we recommend reviewing them.

manage_cookies.title: 4. How to Manage Cookies

items.browser: Browser settings: You can delete or block cookies
items.app_settings: App settings: You can modify ad preferences

manage_cookies.warning: Warning: Blocking some cookies may affect website functionality.

consent.title: 5. Your Consent
consent.content: By using our website and application, you consent to the use of cookies in accordance with this policy.

updates.title: 6. Policy Updates
updates.content: We may update this policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page.

contact.title: 7. Contact
contact.content: For any inquiries about our cookies policy, you may contact us through the official support channels within the platform.
